name: Inchworm
description:
Have you ever wanted to be a tiny, unimportant inchworm? No? Oh...

Welcome to Inchworm! Inchworm is a massive (but also tiny) game where you get to inch your way around the ground looking for tasty plants to eat. As you eat more and more, you get bigger and bigger. How big will you get? 

Credits

Development Lead: Robbie Wagner(PompousRhombus)

Game Developed using Unity Engine

Inchworm and other 3D Models made using Blender

Music Developed using BandLab

Feedback is much appreciated! If you would like to give feedback on any of my games, please use this link. To report bugs, use this link instead.
